page.title: 15METHWOLD HIGH SCHOOL
page.content: Methwold High School Methwold High School is a mixed school for children between the ages of 11 and 16 years.In April 1985 there were 735 pupils, 333 girls and 402 boys. There are 40 teachers, 2 technicians, 2 secretaries, 2 caretakers, 1 groundsman, 6 dinner ladies and 7 cleaners. The girls wear a navy blue skirt, a pale blue blouse and navy jumper. The boys wear blue or black trousers, a pale blue shirt and a navy pull-over.The school tie is blue, white and yellow stripes. Each lesson lasts for 30 minutes. School begins at 8.50 a.m. and ends at 3.35 p.m. There are 18 subjects in the Lower School. The Lower School is the first, second and third years.
